snippet.title: Classic Game Room - PAC MAN for Atari 2600 review
snippet.description:
Pac-Man Atari 2600 review. http://www.ClassicGameRoom.com
Classic Game Room reviews PAC-MAN for the Atari 2600 VCS video game console. 

Do you have Pac Man fever? I do, and let me tell you this game cured it.

Pac Man was one of the most popular games in the 1980's and a staple of every arcade. Pac Man had a cartoon, he had a breakfast cereal and he slept with hot chicks like Ms. Pac Man. Pac Man invented this retro gaming style.  This is old school antique vintage retro gaming for gamers at its finest.

But somewhere along the line it all went bad... right about the time Pac Man tried to port himself over to the Atari 2600.

Be sure to watch the original Classic Game Room episodes. Classic Game Room was the original classic video game review show on the Internet in 1999-2000, now on DVD.
